Package curam.util.resources

This package contains various utility classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
EnvironmentConstants Generated EnvironmentConstants environment file.
EnvironmentConstants.BatchLauncher These settings configure the behavior of Curam when problems occur invoking batch programs.
EnvironmentConstants.Custom These settings allow a developer to replace elements of the Curam infrastructure with their own customized handlers.
EnvironmentConstants.Database These settings configure Curam for database communication.
EnvironmentConstants.Environment These settings configure the environment for your Curam application.
EnvironmentConstants.IEG These settings configure the properties which relate to the IEG Environment.
EnvironmentConstants.JMX These settings configure the JMX infrastructure for your Curam application.
EnvironmentConstants.KeyServer These settings allow a customer to configure the behavior of the KeyServer.
EnvironmentConstants.Rules These settings configure the rules infrastructure of Curam.
EnvironmentConstants.Security These settings configure the authentication behavior of Curam.
EnvironmentConstants.SMTP These settings configure the environment in which the SMTP client element of Curam operates.
EnvironmentConstants.Test These settings configure those elements of Curam which are useful for Unit Testing.
EnvironmentConstants.Trace These control what diagnostic information (in addition to errors which are always logged) is written to the application server's diagnostics file.
EnvironmentConstants.Workflow These settings configure the properties which relate to the Workflow Environment.
EnvironmentConstants.XMLServer These settings configure the environment in which the XML Server will be used.
Trace.CuramMethodInvocationHandler CuramMethodInvocationHandler is an interface that must be implemented by all method trace handlers.
 

Class Summary
ByteArrayUtil This class provides various convenience methods for byte array manipulation.
Configuration Gets application runtime properties.
CTIData Utility class for handling CTI Data.
DatabaseShortname Utility class to handle shortening of database related metadata to the its required length.
DBtoJMS Provides an API to initiate the database-to-JMS message transfer process.
GeneralConstants This class provides a grouping of constants that are used in multiple places in the infrastructure code.
KeySet The names of the commonly used key sets.
Locale Provides convenience fields and methods for accessing various locale-sensitive formatting facilities in Java.
MeasureTime Utility class for measuring and displaying elapsed time.
ProgramLocale This class contains a number of utility methods relating to Locales.
RMILoginUtil RMILoginUtil can be used to log a user into the application when it is running as a standalone Java program which can be tested via RMI invocation.
SMTPConnection Provides interfaces for communicating with an SMTP (simple mail transfer protocol) mail server.
StringUtil StringUtil provides various convenience methods for string manipulation that are not provided by the JDK.
StructCompare StructCompare is provided as a means of comparing Curam generated structures.
Trace Manages debug tracing in the Curam server.
Trace.CuramMethodInvocationHandlerDefault CuramMethodInvocationHandlerDefault is the default method trace handler for Curam.
TraceLogger This class extends the Log4 Logger without providing any extra functionality.
UniqueIDUtil Utility class to handle UniqueID manipulation for the zOS database platform.
XMLParserCache A thread local cache for XML parsers that are relatively expensive to instantiate.
 

Package curam.util.resources Description

This package contains various utility classes.
